entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to make `dotnet run` invoke an MSBuild target? #31253
  • [SBRP] error CS0246 errors is generated TypeForwardAttributes #31250
    .NET 8.0
  • dotnet publish large use ram #31259
  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.ios.sdk::16.2.37 is not found in NuGet feeds #31260
  • Cannot build release net7.0-ios #31261

Closed

  • dotnet workload install wasm-tools hangs #31228
    Discussion
  • Verbatim strings compiled differently on linux and windows #31251
  • Using a ref property in an instance of a WinUI 3 XAML element (e.g. Window) causes a build error since XamlTypeInfo.g.cs get's improperly generated. #30708
  • ASP.NET MVC - view component fails to render via vc tag helper when build with .NET SDK 7.0.200 #30703

PullRequests

Created

  • Move RDG omission to ResolveTargetingPackAssets target #31265
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31262
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31254
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Add unit test for the TypeForwardedTo assembly attributes. #31252
    Area-GenAPI
  • Fix test failures caused by adjusting path of artifacts and the target framework of templates in built SDK #31239
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31214
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • [draft] moving dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31181
  • Skip package when resolving package dependencies if it appears multiple times #30105
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • WebAssembly SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore
